mapper.insert: insert into cart(cartNum, userId, gdsNum, cartStock) values (cart_seq.nextval, #{userId}, #{gdsNum}, #{cartStock})
mapper.select: select row_number() over(order by c.cartNum desc) as num, c.cartNum, c.userId, c.gdsNum, c.cartStock, c.addDate, g.gdsName, g.price, g.thumbImg from cart c inner join tbl_goods g on c.gdsNum = g.gdsNum where c.userId = #{userId}
